options.label: Normalize eol
description:
replaces windows end of lines with unix eol (`
`)

options.label: Decode HTML Entities
description: converts numeral and selected html character-sets into original characters

options.label: Fix Dashes
description: replaces triple dash to mdash
replaces double dash to ndash

options.label: Fix three dots
description: removes spaces between dots
replaces three dots with ellipsis character

options.label: Normalize Ellipsis
description: replaces more than one ellipsis with one
replaces (space|tab|zwnj) after ellipsis with one space

options.label: Normalize Dates
description: re-orders date parts with slash as delimiter

options.label: Fix English Quotes Pairs
description: replaces english quote pairs with their persian equivalent

options.label: Fix English Quotes
description: replaces english quote marks with their persian equivalent

options.label: Fix Hamzeh
description: replaces ه followed by (space|ZWNJ|lrm) follow by ی with هٔ
replaces ه followed by (space|ZWNJ|lrm|nothing) follow by ء with هٔ
replaces هٓ or single-character ۀ with the standard هٔ

options.label: Fix Hamzeh Arabic
description: converts arabic hamzeh ة to هٔ

options.label: Cleanup RLM
description: converts Right-to-left marks followed by persian characters to zero-width non-joiners (ZWNJ)

options.label: Cleanup ZWNJ
description: converts all soft hyphens (­) into zwnj
removes more than one zwnj
cleans zwnj after characters that don't conncet to the next
cleans zwnj before and after numbers, english words, spaces and punctuations
removes unnecessary zwnj on start/end of each line

options.label: Fix Spacing for Braces and Quotes
description: removes inside spaces and more than one outside for `()`, `[]`, `{}`, `“”` and `«»`

options.label: Fix Arabic Numbers
description: replaces arabic numbers with their persian equivalent

options.label: Fix English Numbers
description: replaces english numbers with their persian equivalent

options.label: Fix Misc Non-Persian Chars
description: replaces arabic normal/swash kaf with its persian equivalent
replaces arabic/urdu/pushtu/uyghur/barree yeh with its persian equivalent
replaces kurdish he with its persian equivalent

options.label: Fix Punctuations
description: replaces `,`, `;` with its persian equivalent

options.label: Fix Question Marks
description: replaces question marks with its persian equivalent

options.label: Skip Markdown Ordered Lists Numbers Conversion
description: skips converting english numbers of ordered lists in markdown

options.label: Fix Perfix Spacing
description: puts zwnj between the word and the prefix: `mi*`, `nemi*`, `bi*`

options.label: Fix Suffix Spacing
description: put zwnj between word and suffix: `*am`, `*at`, `*ash`, `*ei`, `*eid`, `*eem`, `*and`, `*man`, `*tan`, `*shan`, `*ha`, `*haye`, `*tar`, `*tari`, `*tarin`, `*hayee`, `*hayam`, `*hayat`, `*hayash`, `*hayetan`, `*hayeman`, `*hayeshan`

options.label: Fix Suffix Misc
description: replaces `ه` followed by `ئ` or `ی`, and then by `ی`, with `ه‌ای`

options.label: Kashidas as Parenthetic
description: replaces kashidas to ndash in parenthetic

options.label: Cleanup Kashidas
description: converts kashida between numbers to ndash
removes all kashidas between non-whitespace characters

options.label: Cleanup Extra Marks
description: removes space between different/same marks
replaces more than one exclamation mark with just one
replaces more than one english or persian question mark with just one
re-orders consecutive marks: `?!` into `!?`

options.label: Cleanup Spacing
description: replaces more than one space with just a single one
cleans whitespace/zwnj between new-lines

options.label: Cleanup Line Breaks
description: cleans more than *two* contiguous line breaks

options.label: Cleanup Begin and End
description: removes space/tab/zwnj/nbsp from the beginning of the new-lines
removes spaces, tabs, zwnj, direction marks and new lines from the beginning and end of text

options.label: Preserve HTML
description: preserves all html tags in the text

options.label: Preserve Comments
description: preserves all html comments in the text

options.label: Preserve Entities
description: preserves all html entities in the text

options.label: Preserve Frontmatter
description: preserves frontmatter data in the text

options.label: Preserve URIs
description: preserves all uri strings in the text

options.label: Preserve NBSPs
description: preserves all no-break space entities in the text

options.label: Preserve Brackets
description: preserves strings inside square brackets (`[]`)

options.label: Preserve Braces
description: preserves strings inside curly braces (`{}`)

options.label: Fix Diacritics
description: cleans zwnj before diacritic characters
cleans more than one diacritic characters
cleans spaces before diacritic characters

options.label: Remove Diacritics
description: removes all diacritic characters

options.label: Fix Numeral Symbols
description: replaces english percent signs (U+066A)
replaces dots between numbers into decimal separator (U+066B)
replaces commas between numbers into thousands separator (U+066C)

options.label: Fix Persian Glyphs
description: converts incorrect persian glyphs to standard characters

options.label: Fix Misc Spacing
description: removes space before parentheses on misc cases
removes space before braces containing numbers

options.label: Fix Spacing for Punctuations
description: removes space before punctuations
removes more than one space after punctuations, except followed by new-lines
removes space after colon that separates time parts
removes space after dots in numbers
removes space before some common domain tlds
removes space between different/same marks

options.label: Markdown Normalize Braces
description: removes spaces between `[]` and `()` (`[text] (link)` into `[text](link)`)
removes space between `!` and opening brace (`! [alt](src)` into `![alt](src)`)
removes spaces inside double `()`, `[]`, `{}` (`[[ text ]]` into `[[text]]`)
removes spaces between double `()`, `[]`, `{}` (`[[text] ]` into `[[text]]`)

options.label: Markdown Normalize Lists
description: removes extra lines between two items on a markdown list beginning with `-`, `*` or `#`
